name: Ling Hun
description:
An imp fox stole Yun's soul just to have some fun. Because of that, Yun now is incomplete, therefor jumping is not attached to gravity rules anymore. Jumping becomes the first of new abilities that has to be mastered in order to follow and catch the imp fox and recover Yun's soul.
Yun has to face some challenges and learn new ways to succeed and get the soul back to be complete again.
Will you be able to help Yun?



Key Feature:

Yun's ability to jump is quite different than in any other Platformer game out there. Due to the lack of soul, Yun's jump keeps momentum and direction untill hit against a ceiling or a wall or else press jump again.

Jumping again:



Game Features:

  • Classic 2D pixel art mixed with handmade Asian ink style art.
  • Puzzle Platformer with a twist on the core mechanics.
  • Collectibles to enhance the experience of the Gameplay.
  • Relaxed gameplay and options to increase the game speed.
  • No hard punishments, no "Game Over". Just try as much as you want or need.
  • Fun and engaging mechanics to learn and have a great experiencie.
